gemini.prompt:
Create a character portrait in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Upper body portrait (head to waist or chest)
- Neutral expression showing character's personality
- Clean background (solid color or simple gradient)
- High quality, detailed illustration
- Consistent with webtoon/manhwa aesthetic
- Front-facing, looking slightly towards viewer
- Vertical composition suitable for character card


Character: Mimi Lo
Age: 17
Physical appearance: Curvy build, expressive face, constantly moving hands.
Visual details: Hair: Pink bob cut with bangs, Top: Standard white shirt customized with colorful pins, Accessory: Oversized white headphones around neck always playing music
Personality (for expression): Bubbly, gossip-loving, oblivious to danger.
